## Form.executeQuery() method

Execute query for the specified block (and children)

**Signature:**

```typescript
executeQuery(block: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | string | The block for which to execute the query. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise indicating whether the query execution was successful.
